SELECT Z.* FROM ( SELECT
TLM.MASTER_SEQ ,TLM.MASTER_TO_ID ,TLM.SUB_YN ,TLM.PRE_REG_YN ,TLM.PRE_LC_NUM ,FN_MEMBER_NAME(TLM.MEMBER_SEQ) AS MEMBER_NM ,TLM.COM_CODE ,FN_COM_CODE(TLM.COM_CODE) AS COM_CODE_NM ,TLM.MEMBER_SEQ ,TLM.PL_CLASS ,FN_CD_DTL('CLS001',TLM.PL_CLASS) AS PL_CLASS_NM ,TLM.PL_WORK ,TLM.CORP_USER_YN ,TLM.CAREER_TYP ,TLM.API_CAREER_YN ,FN_CD_DTL('CAR001',TLM.CAREER_TYP) AS CAREER_TYP_NM ,TLM.PL_PRODUCT ,FN_CD_DTL('PRD001',TLM.PL_PRODUCT) AS PL_PRODUCT_NM ,TLM.PL_REG_STAT ,FN_CD_DTL('REG001',TLM.PL_REG_STAT) AS PL_REG_STAT_NM ,TLM.PL_STAT ,FN_CD_DTL('MAS001',TLM.PL_STAT) AS PL_STAT_NM ,TLM.PL_REGIST_NO ,TLM.CI ,CASE WHEN TLM.PL_CLASS = '1' THEN TLM.PL_M_NAME WHEN TLM.PL_CLASS = '2' THEN TLM.PL_CEO_NAME END AS PL_M_NAME
,TLM.PL_M_Z_ID ,TLM.PL_M_Z_ID_EDU ,FN_CELLPHONE(TLM.PL_CELLPHONE) AS PL_CELLPHONE ,TLM.ADDR ,TLM.ADDR_DETAIL ,TLM.REG_ADDR ,TLM.REG_ADDR_DETAIL ,TLM.ADDR_BASE ,TLM.OTHER_FIELD ,TLM.WITHIN_GOVR ,TLM.PL_EDU_NO ,TLM.CAREER_START_DATE ,TLM.CAREER_END_DATE ,TLM.ENTRUST_DATE ,TLM.COM_CONT_DATE ,TLM.PL_MERCHANT_NAME ,TLM.PL_CEO_NAME ,TLM.PL_MERCHANT_NO ,TLM.PL_BUSINESS_NO ,TLM.COMP_PHONE_NO ,TLM.CORP_FOUND_DATE ,TLM.CAPITAL ,TLM.VOTING_STOCK_CNT ,TLM.PL_PAY_STAT
,case when TLM.COM_REG_DATE = '' then null when TLM.COM_REG_DATE is null then null else TO_DATE(TLM.COM_REG_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') end AS COM_REG_DATE ,TLM.CRE_APP_FI_DATE ,case when pl_stat = '5' then '-' when pl_stat = '13' then '-' else case when CONCAT((tlm.cre_app_fi_date::date - NOW()::date), '일') = '일' then '' else CONCAT((tlm.cre_app_fi_date::date - NOW()::date), '일') end end CRE_APP_FI_DATE_NM ,COALESCE(TLM.CHK_YN,'N') AS CHK_YN ,COALESCE(TLM.ADMIN_CHK_YN,'N') AS ADMIN_CHK_YN ,CASE WHEN TLM.CHK_YN = 'Y' THEN '확인' ELSE '미확인' END CHK_YN_TXT ,CASE WHEN TLM.ADMIN_CHK_YN = 'Y' THEN '확인' ELSE '미확인' END ADMIN_CHK_YN_TXT ,TLM.CRE_APP_DATE AS ORIGIN_CRE_APP_DATE ,case when TLM.CRE_APP_DATE = '' then null when TLM.CRE_APP_DATE is null then null else TO_DATE(TLM.CRE_APP_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') end AS CRE_APP_DATE ,case when TLM.FIRST_APP_DATE = '' then null when TLM.FIRST_APP_DATE is null then null else TO_DATE(TLM.FIRST_APP_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') end AS FIRST_APP_DATE ,TLM.CRE_LICENSE_DATE AS ORIGIN_CRE_LICENSE_DATE ,case when TLM.CRE_LICENSE_DATE = '' then null when TLM.CRE_LICENSE_DATE is null then null else TO_DATE(TLM.CRE_LICENSE_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') end AS CRE_LICENSE_DATE ,TLM.PAY_DATE AS ORIGIN_PAY_DATE ,case when TLM.PAY_DATE = '' then null when TLM.PAY_DATE is null then null else TO_DATE(TLM.PAY_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') end AS PAY_DATE ,TLM.SEND_MSG ,TLM.PL_HIST_CD ,FN_CD_DTL('DRP001',TLM.PL_HIST_CD) AS PL_HIST_CD_NM ,case when TLM.COM_HAEJI_DATE = '' then null when TLM.COM_HAEJI_DATE is null then null else TO_DATE(TLM.COM_HAEJI_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') end AS COM_HAEJI_DATE ,case when TLM.CRE_HAEJI_DATE = '' then null when TLM.CRE_HAEJI_DATE is null then null else TO_DATE(TLM.CRE_HAEJI_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') end AS CRE_HAEJI_DATE ,TLM.FILE_SEQ ,TO_CHAR(TLM.REG_TIMESTAMP,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_TIMESTAMP ,TLM.UPD_SEQ ,TO_CHAR(TLM.UPD_TIMESTAMP,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UPD_TIMESTAMP ,TLM.app_date_hold ,TLM.pl_stat_req_seq ,TLM.pl_stat_req_path FROM TB_LC_MAS01 TLM
AND TLM.USE_YN = 'Y' AND TLM.PL_REG_STAT = '1'
AND TLM.REG_PATH = #{regPath} AND TLM.PL_STAT IN ('5','13','14','15') -- 처리상태가 보완요청, 승인일 홀딩, ,승인요청취소, 회원사 확인완료
AND TLM.COM_CODE IN ( SELECT COM_CODE FROM tb_lc_work WHERE member_seq = #{regSeq} )
AND TLM.PL_STAT = '2'
AND TLM.COM_CODE = CAST(#{comCode} AS INTEGER)
AND FN_MEMBER_NAME(TLM.MEMBER_SEQ) LIKE '%' || #{memberNm} || '%'
AND COALESCE(TLM.CHK_YN,'N') = #{chkYn}
AND COALESCE(TLM.ADMIN_CHK_YN,'N') = #{adminChkYn}
AND TLM.PL_CLASS = #{plClass} AND TLM.CORP_USER_YN = 'N'
AND TLM.PL_CLASS = '1' AND TLM.CORP_USER_YN = 'Y'
AND TLM.PL_PRODUCT = #{plProduct}
AND TLM.PL_STAT = #{plStat}
AND (CASE WHEN TLM.PL_CLASS = '1' THEN TLM.PL_M_NAME WHEN TLM.PL_CLASS = '2' THEN TLM.PL_CEO_NAME END ) LIKE '%' || #{plMName} || '%'
AND FN_CELLPHONE(TLM.PL_CELLPHONE) LIKE '%' || #{plCellphone} || '%'
AND TLM.PL_MERCHANT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{plMerchantName} || '%'
AND TLM.PL_MERCHANT_NO = #{plMerchantNo}
AND TLM.PL_M_Z_ID = #{plMZId}
AND TLM.MASTER_TO_ID LIKE '%' || #{masterToId} || '%'
AND TLM.PRE_LC_NUM LIKE '%' || #{preLcNum} || '%'
AND (case when TLM.COM_REG_DATE = '' then null when TLM.COM_REG_DATE is null then null else TO_DATE(TLM.COM_REG_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') end) >= #{srchDate1}::TIMESTAMP
AND (case when TLM.COM_REG_DATE = '' then null when TLM.COM_REG_DATE is null then null else TO_DATE(TLM.COM_REG_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') end) < #{srchDate2}::TIMESTAMP + INTERVAL '1 day'
AND (case when TLM.FIRST_APP_DATE = '' then null when TLM.FIRST_APP_DATE is null then null else TO_DATE(TLM.FIRST_APP_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') end) >= #{srchDate3}::TIMESTAMP
AND (case when TLM.FIRST_APP_DATE = '' then null when TLM.FIRST_APP_DATE is null then null else TO_DATE(TLM.FIRST_APP_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') end) < #{srchDate4}::TIMESTAMP + INTERVAL '1 day'
ORDER BY ${searchAppDate}, TLM.MASTER_SEQ ASC )Z

SELECT TLM.MASTER_SEQ ,TLM.MASTER_TO_ID ,TLM.SUB_YN ,TLM.PRE_REG_YN ,TLM.PRE_LC_NUM ,TLM.COM_CODE ,FN_COM_CODE(TLM.COM_CODE) AS COM_CODE_NM ,TLM.MEMBER_SEQ ,FN_MEMBER_NAME(TLM.MEMBER_SEQ) AS MEMBER_NM ,(SELECT EMAIL FROM TB_LC_MEMBERS WHERE MEMBER_SEQ = TLM.MEMBER_SEQ) AS EMAIL ,FN_CELLPHONE((SELECT MOBILE_NO FROM TB_LC_MEMBERS WHERE MEMBER_SEQ = TLM.MEMBER_SEQ)) AS MOBILE_NO ,FN_CELLPHONE((SELECT EXTENSION_NO FROM TB_LC_MEMBERS WHERE MEMBER_SEQ = TLM.MEMBER_SEQ)) AS EXTENSION_NO ,TLM.PL_CLASS ,FN_CD_DTL('CLS001',TLM.PL_CLASS) AS PL_CLASS_NM ,TLM.PL_WORK ,TLM.CORP_USER_YN ,TLM.CAREER_TYP ,TLM.API_CAREER_YN ,FN_CD_DTL('CAR001',TLM.CAREER_TYP) AS CAREER_TYP_NM ,TLM.PL_PRODUCT ,FN_CD_DTL('PRD001',TLM.PL_PRODUCT) AS PL_PRODUCT_NM ,TLM.PL_REG_STAT ,FN_CD_DTL('REG001',TLM.PL_REG_STAT) AS PL_REG_STAT_NM ,TLM.PL_STAT ,FN_CD_DTL('MAS001',TLM.PL_STAT) AS PL_STAT_NM ,TLM.PL_REGIST_NO ,TLM.CI ,TLM.PL_M_NAME ,TLM.PL_M_Z_ID ,FN_CELLPHONE(TLM.PL_CELLPHONE) AS PL_CELLPHONE ,TLM.ADDR ,FN_CD_DTL('ADD001',TLM.ADDR) AS ADDR_NM ,TLM.ADDR_DETAIL ,TLM.REG_ADDR ,TLM.REG_ADDR_DETAIL ,TLM.ADDR_BASE ,TLM.OTHER_FIELD ,TLM.WITHIN_GOVR ,TLM.PL_EDU_NO ,case when TLM.CAREER_START_DATE = '' then null when TLM.CAREER_START_DATE is null then null else TO_DATE(TLM.CAREER_START_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') end AS CAREER_START_DATE ,case when TLM.CAREER_END_DATE = '' then null when TLM.CAREER_END_DATE is null then null else TO_DATE(TLM.CAREER_END_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') end AS CAREER_END_DATE ,case when TLM.ENTRUST_DATE = '' then null when TLM.ENTRUST_DATE is null then null else TO_DATE(TLM.ENTRUST_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') end AS ENTRUST_DATE ,case when TLM.COM_CONT_DATE = '' then null when TLM.COM_CONT_DATE is null then null else TO_DATE(TLM.COM_CONT_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') end AS COM_CONT_DATE ,TLM.PL_MERCHANT_NAME ,TLM.PL_CEO_NAME ,TLM.PL_MERCHANT_NO AS ORIGIN_PL_MERCHANT_NO ,TLM.PL_MERCHANT_NO ,TLM.PL_BUSINESS_NO ,TLM.COMP_PHONE_NO ,case when TLM.CORP_FOUND_DATE = '' then null when TLM.CORP_FOUND_DATE is null then null else TO_DATE(TLM.CORP_FOUND_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') end AS CORP_FOUND_DATE ,case when TLM.CORP_FOUND_DATE is null then '' else CONCAT( TO_CHAR(to_timestamp(TLM.CORP_FOUND_DATE,'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY'), '년' , TO_CHAR(to_timestamp(TLM.CORP_FOUND_DATE,'YYYYMMDD'), 'MM'), '월' , TO_CHAR(to_timestamp(TLM.CORP_FOUND_DATE,'YYYYMMDD'), 'DD'), '일' ) end OCR_CORP_FOUND_DATE ,TLM.CAPITAL ,TLM.VOTING_STOCK_CNT ,TLM.PL_PAY_STAT
,TLM.COM_REG_DATE ,COALESCE(TLM.CHK_YN,'N') AS CHK_YN ,COALESCE(TLM.ADMIN_CHK_YN,'N') AS ADMIN_CHK_YN ,TLM.CRE_APP_DATE ,TLM.FIRST_APP_DATE ,TLM.CRE_LICENSE_DATE ,TLM.PAY_DATE ,TLM.SEND_MSG ,TLM.PL_HIST_CD ,FN_CD_DTL('DRP001',TLM.PL_HIST_CD) AS PL_HIST_CD_NM ,TLM.PL_HIST_TXT ,TLM.APPLY_HIST_TXT ,TLM.APPLY_COM_HIST_TXT ,case when TLM.COM_HAEJI_DATE = '' then null when TLM.COM_HAEJI_DATE is null then null else TO_DATE(TLM.COM_HAEJI_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') end AS COM_HAEJI_DATE ,case when TLM.CRE_HAEJI_DATE = '' then null when TLM.CRE_HAEJI_DATE is null then null else TO_DATE(TLM.CRE_HAEJI_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') end AS CRE_HAEJI_DATE ,TLM.FILE_SEQ ,TO_CHAR(TLM.REG_TIMESTAMP,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_TIMESTAMP ,TLM.UPD_SEQ ,TO_CHAR(TLM.UPD_TIMESTAMP,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UPD_TIMESTAMP ,TLM.app_date_hold ,TLM.pl_stat_req_seq ,TLM.pl_stat_req_path FROM TB_LC_MAS01 TLM
AND TLM.MASTER_SEQ = #{masterSeq} AND TLM.USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT EXC_SEQ ,MASTER_SEQ ,CAREER_TYP ,FN_CD_DTL('CAR001',CAREER_TYP) AS CAREER_TYP_NM ,POSITION_NM ,POSITION_CD ,FN_CD_DTL('PST001',POSITION_CD) AS POSITION_CD_NM ,PROPER_CD ,FN_CD_DTL('QUA001',PROPER_CD) AS PROPER_CD_NM ,EXC_NAME ,PL_M_Z_ID ,PL_EDU_NO ,case when CAREER_START_DATE = '' then null when CAREER_START_DATE is null then null else TO_DATE(CAREER_START_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') end AS CAREER_START_DATE ,case when CAREER_END_DATE = '' then null when CAREER_END_DATE is null then null else TO_DATE(CAREER_END_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') end AS CAREER_END_DATE ,FULL_TM_STAT ,FN_CD_DTL('FTM001',FULL_TM_STAT) AS FULL_TM_STAT_NM ,EXPERT_STAT ,FN_CD_DTL('EXP001',EXPERT_STAT) AS EXPERT_STAT_NM ,FILE_SEQ FROM TB_LC_MAS01_IMWON
AND MASTER_SEQ = #{masterSeq} AND USE_YN = 'Y'
ORDER BY EXC_SEQ ASC

SELECT EXP_SEQ ,MASTER_SEQ ,CAREER_TYP ,FN_CD_DTL('CAR001',CAREER_TYP) AS CAREER_TYP_NM ,EXP_NAME ,PL_M_Z_ID ,PL_EDU_NO ,case when CAREER_START_DATE = '' then null when CAREER_START_DATE is null then null else TO_DATE(CAREER_START_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') end AS CAREER_START_DATE ,case when CAREER_END_DATE = '' then null when CAREER_END_DATE is null then null else TO_DATE(CAREER_END_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') end AS CAREER_END_DATE ,FILE_SEQ FROM TB_LC_MAS01_EXPERT
AND MASTER_SEQ = #{masterSeq} AND USE_YN = 'Y'
ORDER BY EXP_SEQ ASC

SELECT OPER_SEQ ,MASTER_SEQ ,OPER_NAME ,PL_M_Z_ID ,FILE_SEQ FROM TB_LC_MAS01_IT
AND MASTER_SEQ = #{masterSeq} AND USE_YN = 'Y'
ORDER BY OPER_SEQ ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_LC_MAS01_STEP ( MASTER_SEQ ,PL_REG_STAT ,PL_STAT ,PL_HIST_TXT ,REG_TIMESTAMP ,REG_SEQ ) SELECT MASTER_SEQ ,PL_REG_STAT ,PL_STAT ,CASE WHEN PL_STAT = '4' THEN FN_CD_DTL('DRP001',PL_HIST_CD) WHEN PL_STAT IN ('3','5','6','7','8','10','11','12') THEN PL_HIST_TXT WHEN PL_STAT IN ('2') THEN APPLY_HIST_TXT WHEN PL_STAT IN ('9') THEN APPLY_COM_HIST_TXT ELSE '' END AS PL_HIST_TXT ,NOW() ,#{regSeq} FROM TB_LC_MAS01 WHERE MASTER_SEQ = #{masterSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT FILE_SEQ , CHECK_CD FROM TB_LC_FILE_CHECK WHERE FILE_SEQ = #{fileSeq}
mapper.update:
UPDATE tb_lc_mas01 SET
app_date_hold = TO_CHAR(NOW(),'YYYYMMDD') , pl_stat = '13'
app_date_hold = null , pl_stat = '2' , CRE_APP_FI_DATE = TO_CHAR((NOW()::date - app_date_hold::date) + cre_app_fi_date::date, 'YYYYMMDD')
, upd_seq = #{updSeq} , upd_timestamp = NOW() WHERE master_seq = #{masterSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TB_LC_MAS01_IMWON WHERE EXC_SEQ = #{excSeq} AND USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT a.MASTER_TO_ID , FN_COM_CODE(a.COM_CODE) AS COM_CODE_NM , FN_CD_DTL('CLS001',a.PL_CLASS) AS PL_CLASS_NM , FN_CD_DTL('PRD001',a.PL_PRODUCT) AS PL_PRODUCT_NM , FN_CD_DTL('MAS001',a.PL_STAT) AS PL_STAT_NM FROM TB_LC_MAS01 a WHERE CI = (SELECT b.CI FROM TB_LC_MAS01 b WHERE b.MASTER_SEQ = #{masterSeq} LIMIT 1) AND a.USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_LC_MAS01 WHERE PL_CLASS = '2' -- 법인 AND PL_MERCHANT_NO = #{plMerchantNo} AND PL_REG_STAT = '3' -- 모집인상태 : 자격취득 AND PL_STAT = '9' -- 처리상태 : 완료 AND PL_PRODUCT = #{plProduct} AND USE_YN = 'Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_LC_MAS01 SET PL_STAT = '5' ,com_upd_date = TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'YYYYMMDD') WHERE master_seq = #{masterSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_LC_MAS01_STEP ( MASTER_SEQ ,PL_REG_STAT ,PL_STAT ,PL_HIST_TXT ,PL_STAT_REQ_SEQ ,PL_STAT_REQ_PATH ,REG_TIMESTAMP ,REG_SEQ ) SELECT MASTER_SEQ ,PL_REG_STAT ,PL_STAT ,CASE WHEN PL_STAT = '4' THEN FN_CD_DTL('DRP001',PL_HIST_CD) WHEN PL_STAT IN ('3','5','6','7','8','10','11','12') THEN PL_HIST_TXT WHEN PL_STAT IN ('2') THEN APPLY_HIST_TXT ELSE '' END AS PL_HIST_TXT ,#{regSeq} ,'3' ,NOW() ,#{regSeq} FROM TB_LC_MAS01 WHERE MASTER_SEQ = #{masterSeq}
